name: Quilted caparison with harness
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. The cape is decorated with crenellations and is completed with a Wielun harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver\, but at the same time limits its speed and stamina.

name: Executioner's caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the head\, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery. It makes the animal bolder\, but it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Dragon saddle
description: Excellent versatile saddle made of solid wood with decorative horn and saddle bags. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Halved caparison crenellated
description: A cloth cape covering the entire body of the horse except its neck and head. While it makes the animal more courageous\, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Quilted caparison with harness
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders\, complete with a Hague harness. It makes the horse bolder and stronger\, but also limits its speed and stamina.

name: Executioner's caparison quilted
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. Makes the horse bolder and braver. It does\, however\, slightly limit its speed and stamina.

name: Caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse except its head and neck\, decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Dragon saddle
description: Excellent versatile saddle made of solid wood with decorative horn and saddle bags. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Executioner's caparison simple
description: A cloth cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. It does not make the animal very brave and has little effect on its speed and carrying capacity.

name: Plain tourney caparison
description: A cloth cape covering the entire body of the horse. It makes the animal more courageous\, but it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Executioner's caparison quilted
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. Makes the horse bolder and braver. It does\, however\, slightly limit its speed and stamina.

name: Norman saddle
description: Saddle with slightly raised cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Tournament caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Soldier's saddle
description: Lightweight saddle with reinforced saddle pads and a rear cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Tournament caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery. It makes the animal much bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Lovari saddle
description: Equestrian saddle with wooden seat and knitted saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However\, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.

name: Transylvanian knight's saddle
description: Quality solid wood saddle with decorative horn\, padded fenders and saddle bags. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Bravante saddle
description: A first class versatile saddle with bronze-lined cantle\, decorated fenders and sheep's wool pads. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Knight's horseshoes
description: Honest horseshoes with studs to help the animal achieve better speed and grip.

name: Hague harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes. Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Mainz harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Mainz harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Tournament caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the entire body of the horse decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Hague harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes. Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Caparison á la crupper decorated
description: Thick cloth cape with embroidery covering only the horse's loins. While the cape makes the animal bolder\, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Tyrolian chanfron
description: Robust chanfron forged from one piece of polished steel. Includes a crenellated bridle. It gives the animal courage and slightly slows it down while galloping.

name: Moglen saddle
description: Equestrian saddle with bronze cantle\, rosettes and leather saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However\, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.

name: Prague saddle
description: Versatile saddle with reinforced cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Bravante saddle
description: A first class versatile saddle with bronze-lined cantle\, decorated fenders and sheep's wool pads. The generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Wielun harness
description: Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits its speed and stamina.

name: Cracowian saddle
description: A unique saddle with a significantly extended cantle\, decorated fenders and top grain leather saddle bags. However\, the generous extension of the carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Executioner's caparison quilted
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. Makes the horse bolder and braver. It does\, however\, slightly limit its speed and stamina.

name: Wielun harness
description: Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits its speed and stamina.

name: Sharukan briddle
description: Bronze decorated bridle consisting of of a bit\, cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece\, noseband and browband. The better the bridle\, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.

name: Norman saddle
description: Saddle with slightly raised cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Wielun harness
description: Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits its speed and stamina.

name: Plain tourney caparison
description: A cloth cape covering the entire body of the horse. It makes the animal more courageous\, but it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Dragon chanfron
description: Steel chanfron in the shape of a dragon's head with eye protection and a simple bridle. In battle it makes the animal much braver\, but in gallop it slightly slows down the horse.

name: Lovari saddle
description: Equestrian saddle with wooden seat and knitted saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However\, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.

name: Rattay harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes. Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Executioner's caparison with harness
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the head\, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery\, crenellations and a Mainz harness. It makes the animal significantly bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Prague saddle
description: Versatile saddle with reinforced cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Bridon saddle
description: High quality tournament saddle with bronze lined cantle and fur cushions. The generous increase in carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Wielun harness
description: Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits its speed and stamina.

name: Mainz harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Caparison á la crupper decorated
description: Thick cloth cape with embroidery covering only the horse's loins. While the cape makes the animal bolder\, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Lovarian horseshoes
description: Horseshoes designed by Romani blacksmiths called fierari. The rider can expect a generous increase in his horse's speed.

name: Caparison of the Lord Ruthard
description: Cloth hood in Ruthard colours covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. It does not make the animal very brave and the effect on its speed and carrying capacity is negligible.

name: Sharukan briddle
description: Bronze decorated bridle consisting of of a bit\, cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece\, noseband and browband. The better the bridle\, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.

name: Tournament caparison quilted
description: Thick quilted cape covering the whole body of the horse decorated with crenellations. It makes the horse more courageous and strong\, but limits its speed and stamina.

name: Wielun harness
description: Leather harness with crenellations and loose hanging straps.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits its speed and stamina.

name: Bridle with plating
description: A simple bridle consisting of a bit\, plated cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece and browband. The better the bridle\, the greater the bonus on the horse's stamina and speed.

name: Bridle of the Holy Roman Empire
description: First class bridle consisting of a bronze decorated bit\, cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece\, browband and noseband. It helps the horse to achieve higher speed and stamina.

name: Bridle of the Holy Roman Empire
description: First class bridle consisting of a bronze decorated bit\, cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece\, browband and noseband. It helps the horse to achieve higher speed and stamina.

name: Executioner's caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the head\, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery and crenellations. While it makes the animal bolder\, it also slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders\, complete with a Hague harness. It makes the horse bolder and stronger\, but also limits its speed and stamina.

name: Tyrolian chanfron
description: Robust chanfron forged from one piece of polished steel. Includes a crenellated bridle. It gives the animal courage and slightly slows it down while galloping.

name: Norman saddle
description: Saddle with slightly raised cantle. It extends the horse's carrying capacity only modestly. But the effect on its speed is also negligible.

name: Quilted caparison with harness
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. The cape is completed with a Mainz harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver\, but at the same time it noticeably limits its speed and stamina.

name: Tournament bridle
description: Bridle decorated with crenellation consisting of a bit\, cheekpieces\, reins\, headpiece\, browband and noseband. It helps the horse to achieve higher speed and stamina.

name: Bridon saddle
description: High quality tournament saddle with bronze lined cantle and fur cushions. The generous increase in carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Tournament caparison quilted
description: Thick quilted cape covering the whole body of the horse decorated with crenellations. It makes the horse more courageous and strong\, but limits its speed and stamina.

name: Quilted caparison with harness
description: Thick quilted cape covering the horse's head\, neck and shoulders. The cape is completed with a Mainz harness. It makes the horse bolder and braver\, but at the same time it noticeably limits its speed and stamina.

name: Mainz harness
description: Leather harness with loose hanging straps decorated with rosettes.  Helps with balance\, slightly improves carrying capacity and makes the horse more courageous. However\, it limits his speed and stamina.

name: Executioner's caparison with harness
description: A cape of thick cloth covering the head\, neck and shoulders of the horse. The cape is decorated with embroidery\, crenellations and a Mainz harness. It makes the animal significantly bolder\, but slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Skalitz caparison
description: It may be just a caparison\, but in medieval society\, a left-handed child needs to show that at least one of his parents belonged to the nobility.

description: Equestrian saddle with wooden seat and knitted saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However\, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.

description: High quality tournament saddle with bronze lined cantle and fur cushions. The generous increase in carrying capacity brings with it a reduction in the speed of the animal.

name: Moglen saddle
description: Equestrian saddle with bronze cantle\, rosettes and leather saddle blanket. It generously extends the horse's carrying capacity. However\, the rider has to take into account a considerable limitation of the animal's speed.

name: Halved caparison decorated
description: A cape of thick cloth covering only the head\, neck and back\, decorated with embroidery and crenellations. It makes the animal much bolder\, but at the same time slows it down and limits its carrying capacity.

name: Unknown potion
description: An unknown potion. God alone knows what good - or bad - it can do.

name: Henry's Nighthawk
description: You will see better in the dark and Energy will not decrease at all\, lasts 25 minutes.

name: Sulphur
description: Yellow nonmetal represents the masculine element in the mystery of alchemy. It is an indispensable material for the manufacture of gunpowder\, because it is associated with the principle of combustion.

name: Weak Artemisia
description: Increases Strength by 2 for 10 minutes.

name: Weak Painkiller brew
description: Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 15% less. Lasts 10 minutes.

name: Strong Aesop
description: Increases Horsemanship and Houndmaster by 5 for half a day. Animals will take less notice of you\, so you'll find it easier to approach them. Dogs won't notice you at all.

name: Strong Aqua Vitalis
description: You lose 30% less Health and slows bleeding by 30%. Lasts 10 minutes.

name: Strong Embrocation
description: Increases Agility by 4 and Sprint will cost 20% less Stamina\, lasts 15 minutes.

name: Strong Painkiller brew
description: Suppresses the effects of injury and your maximum Stamina decreases with Health 50% less\, lasts 20 minutes.

name: Henry's Chamomile brew
description: For two days\, sleep will heal you five times faster and restore Energy three times faster.

name: Nighthawk
description: You will see better in the dark and Energy will decrease 25% slower\, lasts 15 minutes.

name: Strong Chamomile brew
description: For one day\, sleep will heal you four times faster and restore Energy two times faster.

name: Strong Cockerel
description: Increases Energy by 20 and Energy decreases 20% slower for half a day.

name: Henry's Hair o' the Dog
description: Eliminates drunkenness\, hangover and temporarily suppresses the effects of alcoholism.

name: A suspicious bag
description: What might be inside?

name: Strong Bane Poison
description: Makes running impossible and reduces Health by 110 in 30 seconds. More suitable for poisoning cooking pots than applying to weapons.

name: Strong Fox
description: Increases Speech by 5 and increases your reading speed for a day.

name: Lullaby potion
description: Reduces Energy to 0 and decrease perception. Reduces Stamina and Stamina regeneration by 10% for a quarter of a day.

name: Artemisia
description: Increases Strength by 4 for 10 minutes.

name: Digestive Potion
description: Decreases Nourishment by 20\, cures food poisoning and increases Vitality by 1 for 10 minutes.

name: Strong Artemisia
description: Increases Strength by 4 and both attack and defence cost 25% less Stamina\, lasts 10 minutes.

name: Weak Bowman's Brew
description: Increases Marksmanship by 3 for 10 minutes.

name: Weak Fox
description: Increases Speech by 3 for half a day.

name: Kuba's potion

name: Strong Saviour Schnapps

name: Old horseshoe
description: I reckon this horseshoe has done its fair share of travelling.

name: Gartered hose
description: Long hose are a staple of men's clothing. They are worn by noble lords as well as simple folks. However\, they differ in quality of fabric\, cut or richness of colour. These hose are fashionably joined at the crotch by a separate flap.

name: Rabbi's hood
description: This is a unique clothing asset for an important character. If you got it in game\, report it!

name: Brigandine gauntlets
description: Finger gloves composed of small slats riveted to the leather and completed with a buckle\, so they fit like a glove. Compared to gloves made of cloth\, they last a little less\, but they are lighter and fit better.

name: Simple shoes
description: Low-cut shoes come in a variety of designs. These simple\, comfortable shoes are popular among all societal classes.

name: Capon's gambeson
description: Gambeson of Lord Capon of Pirkstein.

name: A suspicious bag

name: Old brigandine legs

name: Burgher coat
description: A burgher overcoat made of fine fabric with rich embrodiery and decorated buttons.
